description:
Available in English and German. 
The Morse Code Generator converts text into the nostalgic morse sound from the history of radio communication. Still today the morse code is used in amateur radio and automated radio beacons.

Provided are the letters A-Z, the digits 0-9 and the special characters .,+@=()?-/#

With the Sym-Key you can generate the emergency call SOS conforming to standards (not on the TouchPad). 

You can hear the sound over the loudspeaker of the WebOS device, the speed is adjustable in 5 steps from 5WPM to 20WPM.

UPDATE: - V.1.0.2 - Now compatible with webOS2.0 and 3.0
